objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1E2E33'/><rect x='-49' y='0' width='589' height='1080' rx='40' ry='40' fill='#2A4044'/><path d='M850 0C850 0 1000 0 950 270C900 540 1000 810 950 1080H1080V0H850Z' fill='#4B6D63'/><path d='M950 0C950 0 1080 0 1030 270C980 540 1080 810 1030 1080H1080V0H950Z' fill='#5A8277'/><g transform='translate(800,100) rotate(35)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='200' height='30' fill='#5A8277' opacity='0.4'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='150' height='20' fill='#7FBCAB' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='30' y='90' width='180' height='25' fill='#A0D6C8' opacity='0.6'/></g><g transform='translate(100,900) rotate(-25)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='200' height='30' fill='#5A8277' opacity='0.4'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='150' height='20' fill='#7FBCAB' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='30' y='90' width='180' height='25' fill='#A0D6C8' opacity='0.6'/></g><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='50' fill='#7FBCAB' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='450' cy='150' r='30' fill='#A0D6C8' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='250' cy='350' r='40' fill='#5A8277' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Smart Active Noise Cancellation
• 70+ Hours of Playtime
• Cloud Foam Comfort Design

product_details.description: 🔊 IMMERSIVE LAB QUALITY SOUND: Enjoy exceptional sound quality via 40mm drivers, bringing depth and clarity to your music. With 70+ hours of playtime (40+ hours with ANC on), enjoy uninterrupted music sessions or calls. Enjoy another dimension and immersive sound with Spatial Audio, compatible with applications such as Dolby Atmos, Tempest 3D AudioTech and Windows Sonic. You’ll feel like you’re sitting in the middle of a concert or standing in the middle of a fight scene. 🧠🔇 SMART ANC AND BE AWARE MODE: Smart Active Noise Cancelation adjusts to the environment and continually learns how to best cancel noises, offering the best audio experience. Activate the Smart Active Noise Canceling to eliminate external distractions up to 35 dB or switch to Be Aware mode to remain connected to your environment. ☁️ CLOUD FOAM COMFORT: Form-Fit Earcups are ergonomically shaped to the natural outline of the ear. The 1” Cloud Foam cushions and adjustable hinges further customize your comfort for any travel, workout, or commute. 📱 CUSTOMIZE YOUR SOUND + EXPERIENCE VIA JLAB APP: With the new JLab App, customize the ANC/Be Aware settings, touch controls, and sound to your personal preference - or use the presets for JLab Signature, Balance or Bass Boost. Safe hearing option allows you to protect your ears from hearing damage with volume limits. Plus, get software updates for your product right when they're available. 🤳 CRYSTAL CLEAR CALLS: Furnished with cutting-edge noise-canceling microphones, these headphones ensure crystal clear and uninterrupted communication during calls, ensuring exceptional clarity and eliminating external disturbances for an impeccable conversation experience. 📱💻 EASY CONNECTIONS + GOOGLE FIND MY: Utilize Bluetooth Multipoint to seamlessly connect to and toggle between two devices simultaneously for added convenience. Wireless Share Mode allows you to share audio wirelessly between two Lux headphones. Plus effortless pairing with an Android device with Google Fast Pair. Plus with Google Find My Device, you can locate your headphones. 🎧 FOLDABLE DESIGN WITH ROTATING EARCUPS: Designed for convenience and portability, these headphones are easy to store and carry. ✅ SPATIAL AUDIO COMPATIBLE Brand - JLab ** Color - Sage ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern tech product advertisement featuring headphones. It is split into two sections: the left side highlights information, while the right side features a large product image identified by the `product_image` layer. The left section includes a bold title with three lines identified by the `heading` layer, followed by a subheadline (`subheading`) that introduces the product name. Below that is a feature list (`description`) displaying key benefits. A prominent price tag (`price`) in bold font draws attention, paired with a call-to-action button composed of a colored rectangle (`cta_background`) and centered text (`cta`). The background features abstract shapes and smooth gradients that complement the product theme.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Slate: `#1E2E33`
- Teal Gray: `#2A4044`
- Deep Sage: `#4B6D63`
- Muted Aqua: `#5A8277`
- Soft Mint: `#7FBCAB`
- Pale Turquoise: `#A0D6C8`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases over-ear headphones predominantly in a sleek, matte forest green color (#3C5A50). This primary color gives a sophisticated and modern appeal, while subtle darker shading along the curves and joints provides depth and visual interest. Highlights and contours creatively use tonal variations of the same green palette, like a muted olive green (#4B6B60) and deep pine green (#2E453D), to accentuate texture and form. These understated yet rich tones harmonize seamlessly, allowing the logo in a slightly brighter sage green (#6E8E81) to stand out. For an advertisement banner, a complementary palette with neutral greys and soft whites will maintain focus on the product.
